Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan deals 150 damage to target unit or structure from long range.
Root.Name: Kinetic Blast

Root.Tooltip:
Kerrigan gains +200 maximum life.
Life-regeneration rate increased by 100%.
Root.Name: Heroic Fortitude

Root.Tooltip:
Kerrigan leaps to her target and deals 150 damage. Can be used without a target to travel quickly.

Passive: Kerrigan gains +10 damage.
Passive: Attack range reduced by 3.
Root.Name: Leaping Strike

Root.Tooltip: Enemies in target area are stunned for 3 seconds and take 300 damage over time.**Does not stun heroic units**
Root.Name: Crushing Grip

Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan's attacks deal normal damage to her target then jump to additional nearby enemies. Deals 10 damage to up to four additional targets.
Root.Name: Chain Reaction

Root.Tooltip:
Kerrigan dashes through enemies, dealing 50 damage to all enemies in her path.

Passive: Movement speed increased by 30%.
Root.Name: Psionic Shift

Root.Tooltip: Killed Zerglings respawn from your primary Hatchery at no cost. Respawns up to 10 Zerglings every 30 until all Zerglings have returned to life.
Root.Name: Zergling Reconstitution

Root.Tooltip: Overlords morph instantly and provide 50% more supply.
Root.Name: Improved Overlords

Root.Tooltip: Extractors automatically extract vespene gas without Drones.
Root.Name: Automated Extractors

Root.Tooltip: Friendly zerg units in the target area gain +200 maximum life and 100% increased attack speed for 10 seconds.**Does not affect heroic units**
Root.Name: Wild Mutation

Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan spawns six Banelings with timed life.
Root.Name: Spawn Banelings

Root.Tooltip: Heals Kerrigan for 150 life and friendly biological units nearby for 50 life. An additional 50% of the amount healed regenerates over 15.
Root.Name: Mend

Root.Tooltip: Drones morph in groups of two at no additional cost and require less supply.
Root.Name: Twin Drones

Root.Tooltip: Your units and structures gain increased life regeneration and 30% increased attack speed while on creep. Creep Tumors also spread creep faster and farther.
Root.Name: Malignant Creep

Root.Tooltip: Vespene gas harvesting efficiency increased by 25%.
Root.Name: Vespene Efficiency

Root.Tooltip: Enemies damaged by Kerrigan become infested and will spawn 2 Broodlings with timed life if killed quickly.
Root.Name: Infest Broodlings

Root.Tooltip: Each attack temporarily increases Kerrigan's attack speed by 10%. Can stack up to 50% increased attack speed.
Root.Name: Fury

Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan's abilities have their cooldown and energy cost reduced by 20%.
Root.Name: Ability Efficiency

Root.Tooltip: Summons a mighty flying Leviathan with timed life. Deals massive damage and has energy-based abilities.**Can attack ground and air units**
Root.Name: Spawn Leviathan

Root.Tooltip: Delivers Primal Zerg forces with timed life to the battlefield. Drop-Pods contain 40 Zerglings, 5 Roaches, and 5 Hydralisks.
Root.Name: Drop-Pods

Root.Tooltip: Deals 300 damage to enemy units and 700 damage to enemy structures in a large area.
Root.Name: Apocalypse

Root.Tooltip: Returns the unit to the surface.
Root.Name: Unburrow
